title: Dark.Messiah.Of.Might.And.Magic.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Dark.Messiah.Of.Might.And.Magic.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


Year: 2006
Genre: RPG / Action
Developer: Arkane Studios / Kuju Entertainment
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Publication Type: Rip
Game Language: Eng |Rus
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: Not required




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows 2000 / XP
Processor: AMD Athlon , Pentium 2.4 GHz
Memory: 512 MB
Video: Video card with 128 MB of memory and support for Pixel Shader 1.1
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free hard drive space: 7 GB

Game information:

Dark Messiah of Might and Magic - role-playing game of the
new generation, created on an enhanced version of Source
engine from the company Valve. You are waiting for an exciting
adventure in the universe of Might and Magic, and fierce fighting
in a dark medieval surroundings. Become an experienced warrior,
combat mage or assassin. Use a large arsenal of weapons and magical
spells in a set battle with the evil monsters.


Game Features:

Advanced technology. Unusual perspective, which allows to see the
parts of his own body, realistic movement, a unique physical model
and near fights in the first person make this game the best in its genre.

Non-stop action. 12 huge levels, over 40 weapons and dozens of
devastating spells. Engage in close combat, armed with swords
and daggers, bows, use powerful magic against legions of enemy
or act secretly under the cover of darkness.

The dark side of the universe of Might and Magic. Explore remote
area Eschen, populated by fearless orcs, savage goblins, ghouls
and zombies, elusive chupacabra, huge dragons and other amazing
creatures.

A new aspect in the universe of Might and Magic - the forces of
darkness have become powerful as ever.

Carefully crafted plot. The young hero Saref, raised a mighty magician,
must use their combat and magic skills to not fulfilled the prophecy
of the Dark Messiah. But the truth about the past Saref may result
in an unexpected turn on the way to the truth ...

Innovative multiplayer mode. Choose a side in the conflict, and one
of four character classes. Try different versions of network games,
from classic and ending with desmatch regime "Evolution" that preserves
the experience gained and get new inventory items in a multiplayer
campaign. In the battle for the LAN and the Internet
can participate up to 32 players.

Repack Features:

Dark Messiah of Might and Magic
Version of the game - 1.02
Cut multiplayer
Do not recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
Ability to download only the necessary voiceovers
(voices_ru.bin - Russian | voices_en.bin - English)
